Name: EHDSIActiveIngredient
Title: eHDSI Active Ingredient
Descriptino: The Value Set is used as a mandatory code for the Active Ingredient of medications in the Medications Summary as well as the prescription Sections. Also used to code allergy agents in the Allergies and Other Adverse Reactions Section of the patient Summary.

Name: EHDSIAllergenNoDrug
Title: eHDSI Allergen No Drug
Descriptino: The value set is used to code the patient's kind of adverse reactions against substance, food or drugs

Name: EHDSIAllergyCertainty
Title: eHDSI Allergy Certainty
Descriptino: Value Set is used to support or decline the clinical status of the allergy or intolerance

Name: EHDSIAllergyStatus
Title: eHDSI Allergy Status
Descriptino: The value set is used to code the Allergy or Intolerance Clinical Status

Name: EHDSIAnimalSpecies
Title: eHDSI Animal Species
Descriptino: The Value Set is used to code the animal species of specimen subject (animal of the patient)

Name: EHDSIBloodGroup
Title: eHDSI Blood Group
Descriptino: The Value Set is used to code the value of patient’s blood group + Rh

Name: EHDSIBloodPressure
Title: eHDSI Blood Pressure
Descriptino: The Value Set is used for the observations of Blood Pressure recorded in the section for Vital Signs Observations in the Patient Summary. It codes what type of pressure (diastolic, systolic) is measured.

Name: EHDSIBodySite
Title: eHDSI Body Site
Descriptino: The Value Set is used for the details about the anatomical location of a specimen in the Laboratory Result Report or the target body location of a procedure in the Patient Summary.

Name: EHDSIBodySiteLaterality
Title: eHDSI Body Site Laterality
Descriptino: This Value Set is used for the body structure site laterality qualifier. It indicates the body site laterality from which a laboratory specimen is collected.

Name: EHDSIBodyStructureLocation
Title: eHDSI Body Structure Location Qualifier
Descriptino: This Value Set is used for the body structure location qualifier. Concepts modifying the anatomic location.

Name: EHDSICertainty
Title: eHDSI Certainty
Descriptino: Value Set is used to support or decline the clinical status of the condition or diagnosis

Name: EHDSICodeProb
Title: eHDSI Code Prob
Descriptino: The Value Set is used as an optional description of a problem in the patient Summary. It gives an information on the circumstances under which the problem was defined/discovered.

Name: EHDSICountry
Title: eHDSI Country
Descriptino: The Value Set is used to identify the nationality of all persons and organizations.

Name: EHDSICriticality
Title: eHDSI Criticality
Descriptino: Value set is used to estimate of the potential clinical harm, or seriousness, of a reaction to an identified substance

Name: EHDSICurrentPregnancyStatus
Title: eHDSI Current Pregnancy Status
Descriptino: Value set is used to provide the woman's current state at the date the observation was made

Name: EHDSIDisplayLabel
Title: eHDSI Display Label
Descriptino: The Value Set is used to denominate all the labels and messages adopted for the eHDSI CDA display

Name: EHDSIDocumentCode
Title: eHDSI Document Code
Descriptino: Defines to which category the document belongs to : summary, prescription, or dispensation.

Name: EHDSIExceptionalValue
Title: eHDSI Exceptional Value
Descriptino: The Value Set is used to code exceptional values for the required binding in FHIR IGs

Name: EHDSILabCode
Title: eHDSI Laboratory Codes
Descriptino: This Value Set is used for the standard laboratory codes

Name: EHDSILabSpecimenType
Title: eHDSI Laboratory Specimen Type
Descriptino: This Value Set is used for the kind of material that forms the specimen

Name: EHDSILabStudyType
Title: eHDSI Laboratory Study Types
Descriptino: eHDSI Laboratory Study Types. Notes: Note 1: 26436-6 (Laboratory studies) enables issuing a report putting together observations from multiple specialties (disciplines) in the same text block, allowing delivery of a global interpretation comment at the end of the text block that will be rendered at the end of the report. Note 2: Mycology and parasitology, as well as bacteriology, are part of the 18725-2 (Microbiology studies (set)) studies. Note 3: Virology MAY be included in 18725-2 (MICROBIOLOGY STUDIES) or 18727-8 (SEROLOGY STUDIES) or split between both study types, depending upon the Content Creator Actor’s choice.

Name: EHDSILabTechnique
Title: eHDSI Laboratory Technique
Descriptino: This Value Set is used to encode laboratory technique for the result measurement

Name: EHDSILaboratoryReportType
Title: eHDSI Laboratory Report Types
Descriptino: eHDSI Laboratory Report Types

Name: EHDSILanguage
Title: eHDSI Language
Descriptino: The Value Set is used to identify the language the document will be written with.

Name: EHDSIMorphologicAbnormality
Title: eHDSI Morphologic Abnormality
Descriptino: The Value Set is used to code the morphological abnormalities of the anatomical location where the material is taken.

Name: EHDSIObservationCategory
Title: eHDSI Observation category
Descriptino: This Value Set is used for the Laboratory Observation Results Category code

Name: EHDSIObservationInterpretation
Title: eHDSI Observation Interpretation
Descriptino: This Value Set is used for a rough qualitative interpretation of the Laboratory Observation Results

Name: EHDSIOutcomeOfPregnancy
Title: eHDSI Outcome of Pregnancy
Descriptino: The Value Set is used to code the outcome of previous pregnancy

Name: EHDSIPerformerFunction
Title: eHDSI Performer Function
Descriptino: Laboratory Performer Function

Name: EHDSIPersonalRelationship
Title: eHDSI PersonalRelationship
Descriptino: The Value Set is used (optionally) to code the type of contact relationship between a person and the patient.

Name: EHDSIPregnancyInformation
Title: eHDSI PregnancyInformation
Descriptino: The Value Set is used to determine the patient's delivery date estimation.

Name: EHDSIPresenceAbsence
Title: eHDSI Presence Absence
Descriptino: The Value Set is used to describe presence and absence findings (qualifier values) of the Laboratory Test Results

Name: EHDSIQuantityUnit
Title: eHDSI Quantity Unit
Descriptino: The Value Set is used to describe the discrete countible entity in which a pharmaceutical product or manufactured item is presented.

Name: EHDSIRareDisease
Title: eHDSI Rare Disease
Descriptino: The Value Set is used to describe the problems and medication reasons.

Name: EHDSIReactionAllergy
Title: eHDSI Reaction Allergy
Descriptino: Value Set is used to encode clinical manifestation of the allergic reaction.

Name: EHDSIReferenceRangeAppliesTo
Title: eHDSI Reference Range Applies To
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the particular target population the reference range applies to

Name: EHDSIReferenceRangeMeaning
Title: eHDSI Reference Range Meaning
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes for a reference range qualifier

Name: EHDSIResolutionOutcome
Title: eHDSI Resolution Outcome
Descriptino: The Value Set is used to describe the clinical status of a problem outcome.

Name: EHDSIRoleClass
Title: eHDSI Role Class
Descriptino: The Value Set is used to make the distinction between an emergency contact and the next of kin for a patient.

Name: EHDSISection
Title: eHDSI Section
Descriptino: The Value Set is used for naming the sections used by the three CDA-documents

Name: EHDSISeverity
Title: eHDSI Severity
Descriptino: The Value Set is used for all Problems and Allergies in the Patient Summary to indicate the severity of the problem (or Allergy)

Name: EHDSISocialHistory
Title: eHDSI Social History
Descriptino: The Value Set is used to code the different elements of the patient's social history.

Name: EHDSIStatusCode
Title: eHDSI Status Code
Descriptino: The Value Set is used to code the different elements of the patient's social history.

Name: EHDSISubstance
Title: eHDSI Substance
Descriptino: The Value Set is used to code the substances of medicine.

Name: EHDSITelecomAddress
Title: eHDSI Telecom Address
Descriptino: The Value Set is used (optionally) to code the usage of a phone number, email and all telecommunications. Can be used for all phone numbers mentioned in the three CDA-documents.

Name: EHDSIVaccine
Title: eHDSI Vaccine
Descriptino: The Value Set is used to identify the patient's vaccinations in the Patient Summary
